New Records: Rilee Rossouw became the first South African player to hit a century in the men's T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Shakib al Hasan's dismissal to a ball pitched outside leg stump summed up Bangladesh's fortunes
Anrich Nortje and Kagiso Rabada's impressive powerplay wickets put Bangladesh under immediate pressure
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa had a rain delay in their previous match, but they performed well in this game
Post-Match Reflections: The win sets South Africa up perfectly for vital clashes against India and Pakistan in the coming days
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain before play and early into the South Africa innings raised fears of a second washout in as many games for De Kock's side
